subject: Ref.: Transfer Payment Approva
body:
Ref.: Transfer Payment Approval Notice.
Approved Payment Valued: US$ 1,500,000.00.
Payment Reference No: UBA/BN/9024/FFG/01-KTU/24.
We write to inform you officially that we have received and confirmed a transfer authorization instruction from United Nations Funds Investigation Unit / International Monetary Fund in your favor valued at US$ 1,500,000.00 (One Million Five Hundred Thousand US Dollars Only). Please note that this approved long awaited Contract /Inheritance payment Instruction has been verified by our Legal Department through the rightful Authorities for a smooth Credit to
your Bank account via Swift Telegraphic Wire Transfer, or ATM Card respectively.
As the Chairman Payment Harmonization Committee, i write to inform you that your Overdue Funds Payment valued US$ 1,500,000.00 is ready for payment 
.Kindly reconfirm your full name, address and
 ID Card
, telephone number / WhatsApp Number:
Thanks
MRS.LARRISA LAWRENCE
Chairman Payment Harmonization Committee

subject: Re: Ref.: Transfer Payment Approva
body:
Hello Lawrence,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the transfer payment approval notice. I appreciate the update on the status of my funds. 

Could you please provide me with more details about the transfer process? Specifically, I would like to know how long it will take for the funds to be credited to my bank account via Swift Wire Transfer or if there is an alternative method such as an ATM card.

Also, could you clarify what you mean by "reconfirming" my full name, address, ID card, and telephone number? I want to ensure that all the information is accurate before proceeding with any further steps.

Best wishes,
Julie

subject: Re: Ref.: Transfer Payment Approva
body:
Hello.  Julie

Thank you very much for your email, regarding the transfer of this funds it
will take two working days the funds will be credited to your  bank
account, kindly reconfirm your bank information and your ID card copy with
WhatsApp number, Address to enable us proceed with processing of your funds
transfer without any delay.

Sincerely,

MRS.LARRISA LAWRENCE
Payments Manager Director.

subject: Re: Ref.: Transfer Payment Approva
body:
Hello Lawrence,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your assistance with the transfer of funds. Before I proceed, I have a few questions to ensure everything goes smoothly.

Firstly, could you please provide me with more details about the source of these funds? It would be helpful to know where they are coming from and why they are being transferred to my bank account.

Secondly, what is the exact process for transferring the funds? Are there any fees or charges involved that I should be aware of?

Lastly, could you please explain how my personal information will be handled and kept secure throughout this process? I want to ensure that my privacy is protected.

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Julie

subject: Re: Ref.: Transfer Payment Approva
body:
Hello.  Julie

Your massage is well received and please go through this previous  massage
i sent to you, We write to inform you officially that we have received and
confirmed a transfer authorization instruction from United Nations Funds
Investigation Unit / International Monetary Fund in your favor valued at
US$ 1,500,000.00 (One Million Five Hundred Thousand US Dollars Only).
Please note that this approved long awaited Contract /Inheritance payment
Instruction has been verified by our Legal Department through the rightful
Authorities for a smooth Credit to
your Bank account via Swift Telegraphic Wire Transfer to your account, Your
funds Origin republic of Burkina faso and here my ID card.

Accept our congratulations in advance.

Sincerely,

MRS.LARRISA LAWRENCE
Chairman Payment

subject: Re: Ref.: Transfer Payment Approva
body:
Hello Lawrence,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you have provided. Could you please clarify how this transfer from the United Nations Funds Unit Monetary Fund came about? I'm curious to know more about the process and why I have been chosen to receive this payment.

Also, could you explain what kind of contract payment this is? Is it related to any specific project or business transaction?

I would also like to know more about the verification process conducted by your Legal Department. How was it determined that I am the rightful recipient of this payment?

Thank you for your assistance in providing these details.

Best wishes,
Julie

subject: Re: Ref.: Transfer Payment Approva
body:
Hello.  Julie

Please kindly reconfirm your bank information and your ID card copy with
WhatsApp number, Address to enable us proceed with processing of your funds
transfer without any delay.

Sincerely,

MRS.LARRISA LAWRENCE
Payments Manager Director.

subject: Re: Ref.: Transfer Payment Approva
body:
Hello Lawrence,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your assistance in processing my funds transfer. However, before I provide any personal information, could you please clarify which bank you are referring to? Also, why is it necessary to provide a copy of my ID card?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Julie

subject: Re: Ref.: Transfer Payment Approva
body:
Hello Lawrence,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your assistance with the transfer of funds. Before we proceed, I have a few questions to ensure everything goes smoothly.

1. Could you please provide me with more details about the source of these funds?
2. What is the total amount that will be transferred?
3. Is there any specific reason why this transfer will take two working days?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Julie

subject: Re: Ref.: Transfer Payment Approva
body:
Attn: Beneficiary,

This is to officially inform you that we are in receipt of your message and
the question in there well noted, without wasting much of our time, I wish
to let you know that you have contacted the right office to claim your
funds and we are ready to work with you to make sure that  you fund is
released to you without any problem.
Thanks

subject: Re: Ref.: Transfer Payment Approva
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your prompt response. I appreciate your willingness to assist me in claiming my funds. Could you please provide me with more details about the process? How long does it usually take to release the funds? Are there any specific documents or requirements that I need to fulfill?

I want to ensure that everything is done correctly and smoothly, so any additional information you can provide would be helpful.

Thank you again for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Julie

subject: Re: Ref.: Transfer Payment Approva
body: Are you stupid stop asking me may questions am done with that.

subject: Re: Ref.: Transfer Payment Approva
body:
Hello there! I apologize if my previous message came across as bothersome. I'm just a curious person who enjoys learning new things and engaging in conversations. If you'd rather not answer any questions, that's completely fine. Is there anything else you'd like to talk about or share?

Best wishes,
Julie
